panels.content:
# Informasjon

Dashbord og brukermanual utviklet i forbindelse med bacheloroppgave **"Styre- og overvåkingsystem for distribusjon av drikkevann"**.

Oppgaven er skrevet av studentene **Johan Haukalid, Jone Vassbø, Markus Raudberget og Peder Ward** fra **NTNU** i sammerbeid med **WAGO Norge AS**.

> Brukermanual for dashbordet "Lekkasjedeteksjon": https://drive.google.com/open?id=15-gmzFDheQc1qlsgD1KaZ4ck4yzGNBKT.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM LeakDetection120SamplesHourlyAverage
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: Oversiktsbilde over distribusjonsnettverket. Tallet inn i sonene viser antall beboere i sonen. FTxx er strømningsmålere og WPxx er vannrør. FT07 er strømningsmåler ut fra vassverket.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM LeakDetection120SamplesHourlyAverage
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: Distribusjonsnettverk

panels.description: Tabellen viser status for hver sone og rør.
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Antall avvik over avviksgrense på 10% siste 24 timene.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pointsOver10 as value,
  'Antall avvik sone 1' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionAlarmPoints
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT01_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pointsOver10 as value,
  'Antall avvik sone 2' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionAlarmPoints
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT02_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pointsOver10 as value,
  'Antall avvik sone 3' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionAlarmPoints
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT03_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  pointsOver10 as value,
  'Antall avvik sone 4' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionAlarmPoints
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT04_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: Antall avvik siste dag.

panels.description: Diagrammet viser nåverdien for forbruket til hver sone.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  Output_Pv as value,
  'Sone 1' as metric
FROM SignalAnalogHmiPv
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT01_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  Output_Pv as value,
  'Sone 2' as metric
FROM SignalAnalogHmiPv
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT02_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  Output_Pv as value,
  'Sone 3' as metric
FROM SignalAnalogHmiPv
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT03_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  Output_Pv as value,
  'Sone 4' as metric
FROM SignalAnalogHmiPv
WHERE
   $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT04_Pv'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: Soneoversikt forbruk.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value as value,
  'FT07' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionHourlyAverage
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT07_Pv' AND
  timestamp>NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: Total mengde ut fra vassverk siste 24 timer.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value as value,
  'FT07' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionHourlyAverage
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'WaterFlowFT07_Pv' AND
  timestamp>NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: FT07 Min

panels.description: Grafen viser avviket mellom inn og ut verdi for "WaterPipe".

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value as value,
  'Avvik inn/ut' as metric
FROM LeakDetectionBalanceHourlyAverage
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  _tagId = 'FT05_is_FT03_FT04'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: Grafen viser avviket mellom inn og ut verdi for "WaterPipe".

ORDER BY timestamp
